question_text: Observe the provided diagram of the Human Eye. [Image: https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/thumb/1/1e/Schematic_diagram_of_the_human_eye_en.svg/640px-Schematic_diagram_of_the_human_eye_en.svg.png] (a) Identify the part responsible for controlling light entering the eye. [1] (b) What is the function of the Retina? [1] (c) Name the fluid present in the anterior chamber. [1]
subject: Science
chapter: The Human Eye and the Colourful World

question_text: Study the diagram of the Nitrogen Cycle.
